== Usage ==

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `target` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
  * [BaseElement <base>]
  * [FormElement <form>]
  * [IsindexElement <isindex>]
  * [LinkElement <link>]
